techmeme.title: Google releases Gemini 2.0 Flash to generate images, audio, and text, and use third-party apps and services, available via Gemini API and developer platforms (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Google unveils Deep Research, an AI tool to let its Gemini chatbot scour the web and write a detailed report, available in English for Gemini Advanced users (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Google unveils Project Mariner, a prototype AI agent built by Google DeepMind that can control Chrome, move the cursor, click buttons, fill out forms, and more (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Google unveils an updated Project Astra, which can record and summarize videos recorded using an Android app or prototype glasses and answer questions (Ina Fried/Axios)
Google says it is testing AI agents based on Gemini 2.0 that can understand rules in video games like Clash of Clans to help players out (Jay Peters/The Verge)
